V\u1edbi s\u1ef1 h\u1ed9i t\u1ee5 c\u1ee7a \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ty \u0111\u1ea7u ng&agrave;nh, \u0111&acirc;y l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n b\u1ed5 &iacute;ch gi&uacute;p gia t\u0103ng s\u1ef1 k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i v&agrave; h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c.<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>VTG Exhibition is an annual event held for enterprises specializing in textile machinery and equipment nationwide. With the convergence of many leading companies in the industry, this is one of the useful events that helps increase connection and cooperation.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m VTG l&agrave; s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n th\u01b0\u1eddng ni&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c d&agrave;nh cho c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p chuy&ecirc;n v\u1ec1 m&aacute;y m&oacute;c, thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c. V\u1edbi s\u1ef1 h\u1ed9i t\u1ee5 c\u1ee7a \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ty \u0111\u1ea7u ng&agrave;nh, \u0111&acirc;y l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n b\u1ed5 &iacute;ch gi&uacute;p gia t\u0103ng s\u1ef1 k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i v&agrave; h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"370\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/VTG%202024\/407633467_1234373680843323_7063274817275521960_n.png\" width=\"960\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" src=\"hgjf\" \/>N\u0103m nay, V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok s\u1ebd tham d\u1ef1 tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng m\u1edbi h\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u01a1n. C&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ti&ecirc;u bi\u1ec3u c\u1ee7a VNB bao g\u1ed3m:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/dung-cu-gan-nhan\">S&uacute;ng b\u1eafn nh&atilde;n m&aacute;c<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/tagpin\/?actilang=true\">Ti b\u1eafn nh&atilde;n<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/day-treo-sinh-hoc\">D&acirc;y treo nh&atilde;n sinh h\u1ecdc<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/nut-ao\">N&uacute;t &aacute;o t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/phu-kien-ao-so-mi\">Khoanh c\u1ed5 &aacute;o v&agrave; b\u01b0\u1edbm c\u1ed5 &aacute;o<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li>Cord lock, puller, Adger Pen,...<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m: Trung t&acirc;m H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 &amp; Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m S&agrave;i G&ograve;n (SECC)<br \/>\r\nGian H&agrave;ng: B1028<br \/>\r\nTh\u1eddi gian: 25\/09\/2024 - 28\/09\/2024<br \/>\r\n\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9: 799 Ngy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Linh, P.T&acirc;n Ph&uacute;, Qu\u1eadn 7, Tp.HCM<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>S\u1ef1 c&oacute; m\u1eb7t c\u1ee7a qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch m\u1eddi l&agrave; ni\u1ec1m vinh d\u1ef1 cho V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok. Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m VTG l\u1ea7n n&agrave;y h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n s\u1ebd t\u1ea1o d\u1ef1ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb v&agrave; ni\u1ec1m tin \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c v&agrave; kh&aacute;ch tham quan gian h&agrave;ng!<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>VTG Exhibition is an annual event held for enterprises specializing in textile machinery and equipment nationwide. With the convergence of many leading companies in the industry, this is one of the useful events that helps increase connection and cooperation.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"370\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/VTG%202024\/407633467_1234373680843323_7063274817275521960_n.png\" width=\"960\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>This year, Van Nang Banok will attend the exhibition with many new products aiming at being more environmentally friendly. Typical products of VNB include:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/dung-cu-gan-nhan\">Attaching tool<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/tagpin\">Tagpin<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/day-treo-sinh-hoc\">Eco-friendly fastener<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/nut-ao\">Recycled button<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/phu-kien-ao-so-mi\">Butterfly Keeper and Collar Band<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li>Cord lock, puller, Adger Pen,...<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud83d\udccdLocation: Saigon Exhibition &amp; Convention Center (SECC)<br \/>\r\n\ud83d\udccdBooth: B1028<br \/>\r\n\ud83d\udccdTime: 25\/09\/2024 - 28\/09\/2024<br \/>\r\n\ud83d\udccdAddress: 799 Nguyen Van Linh, Tan Phu Ward, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u2764The presence of our guests is an honor for Van Nang Banok. This VTG exhibition promises to create many values \u200b\u200band trust with partners and customers.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1000\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/VTG%202023\/vtg%2024_20%20fb%20(4).jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Van Nang Banok at VTG 2023<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1000\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/VTG%202023\/vtg%2024_20%20fb%20(2).jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Van Nang Banok at VTG 2023<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1000\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/VTG%202023\/vtg%2024_20%20fb%20(5).jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Van Nang Banok at VTG 2023<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1000\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/VTG%202023\/vtg%2024_20%20fb%20(3).jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Van Nang Banok at VTG 2023<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\nWe respectfully invite you to visit our booth!<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"van-nang-banok-se-tham-du-trien-lam-may-moc-thiet-bi-cong-nghiep-nganh-det-may-lan-thu-22-vtg-2024","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"46","icon":"1724289985_407633467_1234373680843323_7063274817275521960_n.png","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1724292011","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"5087","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK S\u1ebc THAM D\u1ef0 TRI\u1ec2N L\u00c3M M\u00c1Y M\u00d3C THI\u1ebeT B\u1eca C\u00d4NG NGHI\u1ec6P NG\u00c0NH D\u1ec6T MAY L\u1ea6N TH\u1ee8 22 - V\u1ea1n Nang Banok xin c\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 ch&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;n v&agrave; \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9 t\u1eeb qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch m\u1eddi, v&agrave; s\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c c\u1ee7a ph&iacute;a \u0111\u1ea1i l&yacute;, \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c. V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok mong r\u1eb1ng trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i h\u01a1n, c&oacute; th\u1ec3 mang nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0111&uacute;ng theo ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n - ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/b><\/p>","mota_en":"<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-8a884860-7fff-5882-7803-d0d48416912b\">InaTex 2024 exhibition has officially ended. Van Nang Banok would like to thank the welcome and support from our guests, and the cooperation of our agents and partners. Van Nang Banok hopes that in the future, we can become more widely known and can bring high quality products to the international market in accordance with Japanese standards - Vietnamese quality.<\/b><\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-50bded3f-7fff-067c-d35a-8aa6bac64f2b\">Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m InaTex 2024 \u0111&atilde; ch&iacute;nh th\u1ee9c k\u1ebft th&uacute;c. V\u1ea1n Nang Banok xin c\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 ch&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;n v&agrave; \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9 t\u1eeb qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch m\u1eddi, v&agrave; s\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c c\u1ee7a ph&iacute;a \u0111\u1ea1i l&yacute;, \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c. V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok mong r\u1eb1ng trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i h\u01a1n, c&oacute; th\u1ec3 mang nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0111&uacute;ng theo ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n - ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-50bded3f-7fff-067c-d35a-8aa6bac64f2b\">C&ugrave;ng nh&igrave;n l\u1ea1i nh\u1eefng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng t&iacute;ch c\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i t\u1ea1i tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m:<\/b><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-8aa5ea78-7fff-4d29-312a-bec8e2fbb7a3\">V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th&agrave;nh l\u1eadp t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam t\u1eeb n\u0103m 2014, l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u uy t&iacute;n v\u1ec1 ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i n\u01b0\u1edbc.Li&ecirc;n h\u1ec7 ngay v\u1edbi ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1ea1i website: https:\/\/www.vannang-banok.com\/<\/b><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-010fe668-7fff-9cf5-3d1c-3ea3063b0b34\">InaTex 2024 exhibition has officially ended. Van Nang Banok would like to thank the welcome and support from our guests, and the cooperation of our agents and partners. Van Nang Banok hopes that in the future, we can become more widely known and can bring high quality products to the international market in accordance with Japanese standards - Vietnamese quality.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-010fe668-7fff-9cf5-3d1c-3ea3063b0b34\">Let&#39;s look back at our positive activities at the exhibition:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-010fe668-7fff-9cf5-3d1c-3ea3063b0b34\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"451\" \u2013 TRI\u1ec2N L\u00c3M C\u00d4NG NGHI\u1ec6P D\u1ec6T MAY VI\u1ec6T NAM S\u1eaeP DI\u1ec4N RA V\u00c0O TH\u00c1NG 4 N\u0102M 2024","tenbaiviet_en":"SAIGONTEX \u2013 VIETNAM TEXTILE AND GARMENT INDUSTRY EXHIBITION IS ABOUT TO TAKE PLACE IN APRIL 2024","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-5a637f77-7fff-307f-79b1-6a166f458f61\">Sau th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ee3t tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m tr\u01b0\u1edbc, \u0111\u1ee3t tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m SaigonTex - Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m C&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c mang l\u1ea1i nhi\u1ec1u gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb nh\u1ea5t cho doanh nghi\u1ec7p v\u1ec1 may m\u1eb7c, in \u1ea5n trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i n\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/b><\/p>","mota_en":"<p><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e2614d88-7fff-76c8-6d07-ef14df3b4dd7\">After the success of previous exhibitions, the SaigonTex exhibition - Vietnam Textile and Garment Industry Exhibition promises to continue to bring the most value to businesses in garment and printing at home and abroad.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<h2><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">V\u1ec1 tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m SaigonTex 2024<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h2><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">SaigonTex &ndash; Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m C&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t v&agrave; c&oacute; \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c song song \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi v\u1edbi SaigonFabric &ndash; H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 Nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u D\u1ec7t May Vi\u1ec7t Nam. L&agrave; th&agrave;nh vi&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a UFI &ndash; Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m (www.ufi.org). SaigonTex \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a UFI.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">Sau s\u1ef1 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng SAIGONTEX 2023, S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u0111&atilde;, thu h&uacute;t s\u1ef1 quan t&acirc;m \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o c\u1ee7a h&agrave;ng ch\u1ee5c ng&agrave;n l\u01b0\u1ee3t kh&aacute;ch trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ebfn tham quan, trao \u0111\u1ed5i kinh nghi\u1ec7m, nh\u1eefng c&aacute;i b\u1eaft tay, nh\u1eefng m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n t&igrave;nh h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb, \u0111&ocirc;i b&ecirc;n c&ugrave;ng c&oacute; l\u1ee3i.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"245\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/6Ze3aKzY28hfbWV-dHkQLo6VdPaooIdNLIWqsEDo4la5NwSXQOEYX3b7OcYiL-OYnQ1cvt_Ha6mRiXbp6gd55uOzqXrPs9MtcDqs-1rwsS8qvgEhuL6vcSraGVNnldiKpb9ZSoHpWrI0baCZjfz6DZ8\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">SaigonTex 2024 s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1eeb ng&agrave;y 10 \u0111\u1ebfn ng&agrave;y 13 th&aacute;ng 4, n\u0103m 2024 t\u1ea1i Trung t&acirc;m Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m S&agrave;i G&ograve;n (SECC) &ndash; 799 Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Linh, qu\u1eadn 7, th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"443\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/S39u_b9A3oTLPnCjygxPI0uIxTz_y2XXQ8zf9QOIZy5zwsxRvMeA79Zu-i5gV_YuFqC-e-fcNTYwdOc6rpbqIzg1u4lBdmCQ9Mm4fsxv77T72G5L55zhHSX9CEpCus6SfDelJFSydVbs3YYEGaPdR8E\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n l&agrave; gian h&agrave;ng thu h&uacute;t c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c v&agrave; kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng li&ecirc;n quan \u0111\u1ebfn ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok l&agrave; c&ocirc;ng ty ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i ra \u0111\u1eddi t\u1eeb n\u0103m 2014 t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu nh\u01b0:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">D&acirc;y treo nh&atilde;n<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">S&uacute;ng b\u1eafn nh&atilde;n<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">M&oacute;c treo<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">K\u1eb9p nh\u1ef1a<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">B\u01b0\u1edbm c\u1ed5 &aacute;o<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">Khoanh c\u1ed5 &aacute;o<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">&hellip;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">Cho t\u1edbi nay, V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok \u0111ang \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1eeb c&aacute;c nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a nh\u01b0 v\u1ecf tr\u1ea5u, b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc;, nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, PP t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf,... V\u1edbi ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ch&acirc;m &ldquo;S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam theo ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n&rdquo;, V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nh&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u uy t&iacute;n cho doanh nghi\u1ec7p Vi\u1ec7t Nam v&agrave; to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i r\u1ea5t mong \u0111\u1ee3i qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng gh&eacute; th\u0103m gian h&agrave;ng c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i t\u1ea1i Lobby 1 &ndash; L1K08, SECC, HCMC!<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\"><img alt=\"\" 2023.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e7b88704-7fff-4c1d-ccce-c4335c278150\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"606\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/oKRmtZ6UTXLMPJZalQWmbEmjvXQGdJOLLAYa0BpkvLJTo68FBaAKb0jLtRmBEe7qZ6uZwHtQGQCZVVAmHPNc0NGKlNw-KSgeOo9r2Y_GeuzOE9HkcM_8spILEBlnSw14AXfg79vxtjhgIXoua0M6RbM\" width=\"601\" \/><img alt=\"\" height=\"601\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/YI34d6OGh1V3R_ZafAHciP9WEEcdmroexAB-uAM8u9-DuNHj-XpbbZd9TQYCQltKKR1x30trKFbgZTXxbacgRj5vjh8E73wxtxh-NMXkwZbzePiihnnM2GptIojACIaKnmz7rixrbLn9ge317QQIook\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/ArWtmc-UpcCmEQiS2JgLhW-gfNaXeQbEomgBX8SRtSBL4NH5fbkjSCaOITrxMAJY_lQsr8i1dyPbku_S_VBfKIy8r6omgPKxdqQ8Pa8m178WHsuMqSkuNuBdN2CmNXoaCkoB-s25WaKkRMJUnX_RzGo\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>","noidung_en":"<h2><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">About SaigonTex 2024 exhibition<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h2><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">SaigonTex &ndash; Vietnam Textile and Garment Industry Exhibition is the largest and most influential event of the Vietnamese textile industry. The exhibition is held in parallel with SaigonFabric - Vietnam Textile and Garment Raw Materials Fair. A member of UFI &ndash; Global Association of the Exhibition Industry (www.ufi.org). SaigonTex is certified to ensure UFI&#39;s international exhibition quality.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">After the success of SAIGONTEX 2023, the event has attracted the great attention of tens of thousands of domestic and foreign visitors to visit, exchange experiences, shake hands, and form cooperative relationships. based on friendship and mutual benefit.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-f68f8982-7fff-8920-67a7-f31d532fc5ff\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"245\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/6Ze3aKzY28hfbWV-dHkQLo6VdPaooIdNLIWqsEDo4la5NwSXQOEYX3b7OcYiL-OYnQ1cvt_Ha6mRiXbp6gd55uOzqXrPs9MtcDqs-1rwsS8qvgEhuL6vcSraGVNnldiKpb9ZSoHpWrI0baCZjfz6DZ8\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">SaigonTex 2024 will take place from April 10 to 13, 2024 at Saigon Exhibition Center (SECC) - 799 Nguyen Van Linh, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-af7e3ed8-7fff-aeb1-83af-f1da14937ed4\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"443\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/S39u_b9A3oTLPnCjygxPI0uIxTz_y2XXQ8zf9QOIZy5zwsxRvMeA79Zu-i5gV_YuFqC-e-fcNTYwdOc6rpbqIzg1u4lBdmCQ9Mm4fsxv77T72G5L55zhHSX9CEpCus6SfDelJFSydVbs3YYEGaPdR8E\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Van Nang Banok promises to be a booth that attracts partners and customers related to sewing accessories<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Van Nang Banok is a garment packaging materials company established in 2014 in Vietnam, with main products such as:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Label hanger<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Label gun<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Hanger<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Plastic clamp<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Butterfly collar<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Circle the collar<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">&hellip;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Up to now, Van Nang Banok is promoting environmentally friendly products from plastic materials such as rice husk, bio coffee, rice plastic, recycled PP,... Based on &quot;Made in Vietnam withJapanese quality standard&quot;, Van Nang Banok is one of the reputable suppliers of accessories for Vietnamese and global businesses.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-261f16ea-7fff-eaad-97f6-a0c86a6ecff9\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"417\" HCMC!<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Let&#39;s have a look back at Van Nang Banok Booth at SaigonTex 2023.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\"><img
